raw_json.html_title: Why JR‚Äôs Training is Different | R-bloggers
raw_json.main_html:
Why JR‚Äôs Training is Different

Posted on June 9, 2025 by The Jumping Rivers Blog in R bloggers | 0 Comments

[This article was first published on The Jumping Rivers Blog, and kindly contributed to R-bloggers]. (You can report issue about the content on this page here)
Want to share your content on R-bloggers? click here if you have a blog, or here if you don't.

At Jumping Rivers, we believe training should be more than just a tick-box exercise. It should be transformative. Whether you‚Äôre learning R, Python, SQL, Git or Posit for the first time or diving into advanced topics like machine learning and Quarto, our courses are built to help you actually use what you learn ‚Äî not just watch someone code. View our upcoming catalogue here!

What Sets Us Apart?

  • Expert Trainers: Our trainers aren‚Äôt just good with code ‚Äî they‚Äôre professional data scientists who solve real-world problems for industry clients every day. From building dashboards to optimising machine learning models, they bring this experience straight into the classroom.

  • High-Quality Content: We regularly update our material to reflect the latest best practices, tools, and workflows. No tired examples. No generic slides. Just practical, polished, and engaging content that‚Äôs been road-tested across sectors.

  • Hands-On and Practical: Expect live coding, interactive exercises, and the space to ask questions. You‚Äôll finish the course with code you wrote and skills you can apply immediately.

  • Tailored for You: We design our sessions around your level, your pace, and your goals. Whether you‚Äôre an academic, analyst, developer, or decision-maker, you‚Äôll get value from day one.

What People Are Saying

‚ÄúGenuinely one of the best courses I‚Äôve attended ‚Äî well-paced, friendly, and full of real-world examples.‚Äù

‚ÄúThe trainer was fantastic ‚Äî incredibly knowledgeable and approachable. I finally feel confident using Git and R together.‚Äù

‚ÄúI loved how applied it all was. We weren‚Äôt just learning syntax ‚Äî we were solving actual problems.‚Äù

‚ÄúGreat value. I‚Äôve already used what I learned in a project at work.‚Äù

Upcoming Live Training (with Super Early Bird Tickets üéâ)

Here are all the upcoming courses for July and August. Please note all times are UK time.

7-8th July

Introduction to R ‚Äì 09:00AM-12:30PM

14‚Äì15 July

Data Wrangling in the Tidyverse ‚Äì 09:00AM-12:30PM

Introduction to Shiny ‚Äì 13:30PM‚Äì17:00PM

21‚Äì22 July

Programming with R ‚Äì 09:00AM-12:30PM

Introduction to SQL ‚Äì 09:00AM-12:30PM

28‚Äì29 July

Data Visualisation with ggplot2 ‚Äì 09:00AM-12:30PM

Machine Learning with Tidymodels ‚Äì 13:30PM‚Äì17:00PM

11‚Äì12 August

Introduction to Python ‚Äì 09:00AM-12:30PM

Statistical Modeling with R ‚Äì 13:30PM‚Äì17:00PM

18‚Äì19 August

Programming with Python ‚Äì 09:00AM-12:30PM

Advanced Machine Learning with Tidymodels ‚Äì 13:30PM‚Äì17:00PM

20‚Äì21 August

Data Visualisation with Python ‚Äì 09:00AM-12:30PM

Introduction to R ‚Äì 13:30PM‚Äì17:00PM

Ready to Skill Up?

‚úÖ Small class sizes

‚úÖ Live sessions with expert trainers

‚úÖ Immediate impact on your day-to-day work

‚úÖ Super early bird tickets ‚Äî limited and going fast!

üéü Sign up now and invest in training that actually moves the needle. Whether you‚Äôre upskilling your team or boosting your own confidence, you‚Äôre in the right place.

For updates and revisions to this article, see the original post
